description:
Medical professional with a taste for entrepreneurial projects, founder and creator of the Beckler Medical Laorhen™© brand
Socially empathetic and philanthropist of society, I like animals and their protection, I am happy to live together and learn about the culture of others, listen carefully and learn from others.
I love to contribute to others and encourage others, sports enthusiast of all kinds, climbing, diving, mountain biking, skiing, riding, archery, among others, hobby reading, horror movies, traveling, chess, playing the piano, guitar, I am romantic, reserved but I enjoy intimacy with rough and also sensitive sexual games
